name: bobinserters
title: Bob's Adjustable Inserters mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Adds a GUI for customising inserter pickup/drop positions.

Also adds hot-keys.

SHIFT + P: Change pickup range (Long inserters technology will allow short/long toggle.)
SHIFT + O: Change drop range (Long inserters technology will allow short/long toggle.)
SHIFT + L: Long Inserter toggle (Long inserters technology will allow short/long toggle on both input and output.)
SHIFT + N: Drop location offset toggle (Near inserters technology will allow near/far side of belt toggle)
CTRL + R: Change pickup rotation (4 step rotation by default, More inserters technology will unlock additional directions)
SHIFT + E: Open GUI

All hotkeys can be remapped, and an option exists to open the GUI at the same time as the standard inserter GUI instead of with a hotkey.
This mod also adds in researches to unlock the more adjustment options.

Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zu9LmpZaVPg
